FuncDef:
The uplink-port enable command configures an interface as an uplink interface.
The undo uplink-port enable command cancels the uplink interface configuration. The uplink-port enable command configures an interface as an uplink interface. The undo uplink-port enable command cancels the uplink interface configuration. By default, an interface is not an uplink interface.
ParentView: 100GE interface view,10GE interface view,200GE interface view,25GE interface view,400GE interface view,50GE interface view,Eth-Trunk interface view,Interface group view
ExtraInfo: This command configures an interface as an uplink interface.
